SELECT A.QNA_NO , A.USER_ID , A.QNA_TIT , A.QNA_TXT , A.QNA_ST , A.QNA_TP , A.INSERT_DATE FROM TBL_QNA A WHERE A.QNA_ST = '답변대기' AND A.QNA_TP = #{qnaTp}
ORDER BY A.INSERT_DATE LIMIT #{limitNum}
SELECT A.QNA_NO , A.USER_ID , A.QNA_TIT , A.QNA_TXT , A.QNA_ST , A.QNA_TP , A.INSERT_DATE FROM TBL_QNA A WHERE A.QNA_NO = #{qnaNo}

SELECT A.REPORT_NO , A.CORP_CD , A.USER_ID , A.REPORT_TIT , A.REPORT_TXT , A.REPORT_ST , A.INSERT_DATE FROM TBL_REPORT A WHERE A.REPORT_ST = '처리대기'
ORDER BY A.INSERT_DATE LIMIT #{limitNum}
SELECT A.REPORT_NO , A.CORP_CD , A.USER_ID , A.REPORT_TIT , A.REPORT_TXT , A.REPORT_ST , A.INSERT_DATE FROM TBL_REPORT A WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{reportNo}
SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TIT , A.NOTICE_TXT , A.NOTICE_TODT , A.NOTICE_FRDT , A.INSERT_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
